Create a photo booth that uses augmented reality to superimpose unique filters and effects onto the user's face and body, creating a fun and interactive experience for events and parties.
Develop a smartphone app that uses artificial intelligence to automatically enhance and edit photos, improving color balance, contrast, and other factors to make the user's photos look their best.
Create a virtual reality camera that allows users to capture and explore 360-degree photos and videos, immersing them in a fully interactive and immersive experience.
Develop a camera that uses advanced image stabilization technology to capture clear and sharp photos in low-light conditions, making it ideal for night photography and videography.
Create a camera that uses machine learning to recognize and track objects in a scene, allowing users to automatically focus on specific subjects and capture clear and detailed shots.
